library.description: Library contains all published assignments made by you or your colleagues

favorites.description: You will find the assignments you bookmarked here in Favorites

myTasks.description: You will find your drafts and your published assignments in My tasks

addAssignment.description: You can add your first assignment here

allAssignmentIntro.description: Let's have a closer look at the assignments in the library

addFavourite.description: To add an assignment to Favorites, click on the bookmark icon

shareAssignment.description: Use this icon to share the assignment with your client

sharedTimes.description: This number shows how many times the assignment was shared

assignmentRating.description: Clients can rate the assignments they get. An average rating is shown here.
